name: Default Theme
author: Aaron Horeth
description: This is the default theme, it consists of a dark page background color with a lighter diff region.
main: #main {margin: auto; width: 90%; height: 80%; position: absolute; top: 0; bottom: 0; left: 0; right: 0; padding: 10px;}
diffHeader: #diffHeader {position: relative; top: 0; bottom: 0; left: 0; right: 0; padding: 2px; height: 15%; width: 100%;}
diffBody: .col {float: left; position: relative; left: 52%; /*overflow-x: scroll; overflow-y: scroll;*/ padding: 10px;}
